You wake up and it’s almost noon in a blink of an eye, so you don’t really have time for thinking too much on the things that are around you: like English, vocabulary, toasters, bathtubs, nets and holes and all that kind […]

item.title: The beauty of life being created in 22 photographs
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: There was once a passionate Swedish photographer named Lennart Nilsson (1922-2017) who used a cystoscope to record the beauty of life being created. A cystoscope is a device used by doctors to visualize the insides of your bladder. It is made of a thin tube with aÂ  camera and light on it. Â  Lennart managed […]

item.title: From stones to cute animals in 21 heartwarming pictures
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: From stones to cute animals is only one artist: Akie Nakata. A Japan native artist who paints stones and turn them into these cute animals that look so real and will melt your heart in an instant. More than that, they are so tiny, that you can hold them in the palm of your hand, […]

item.title: 20 Beauty queens of food industry back in the day
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Do you want to be the queen of food? “Not really”, you might say. Today, we blame food for making us crave it and eat it and get fat and spoil our beach bodies and build on our self-doubt about ourselves. It’s vicious circle that starts from food and leads to everything we don’t like […]

item.title: Chuando Tan is 52 years old, but he doesn’t look older than 22
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: How can a guy called Chuando Tan be so good-looking, tone-muscled and fresh at 52? Did he discover the secret of forever youth and beauty? Where is it hidden because I know a lot of other people looking just for that. They would probably pay an insane amount of money to be forever young, forever […]

item.title: This is the largest 3D printed bridge in the world at the moment
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Shangai is now the home of the largest 3D printed bridge in the world. It has been completed this month and it has the length of 26.3 meters and a width of 3.6 meters, designed by Professor Xu Weiguo from the Tsinghua University of Architecture. The bridge is meant for pedestrian use and it is […]

item.title: Age test! 23 Tweets that only people growing up in the 2000s will understand
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Growing up in the 2000s was a lot of fun and these 23 tweets are only for those people over 20. We dare you, under 20 people to read and understand these! We really do! Growing up in the 2000s almost feels like being part of a secret team of specialists in technology and gaming; […]

item.title: Gamer beats professional racing car driver on the track
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: No, this title is not click bait. A gamer actually beats a professional racing car driver on the track and the whole world was left speechless. You would think that a professional racing car driver is a superman when it comes to reflexes, agility, knowing when to shift and knowing when and just how much […]

item.title: Only hairstylists will understand these 28 memes
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: It must be hard being a hairstylist and having to put up with everyone’s opinion of what they want to look like. Hairstylists must be good listeners, too. They must have empathy and understanding and somehow, read their clients’ mind in order to give them what they want. It sounds like a tough job, don’t […]

item.title: 13 reasons why you should sleep naked. Number 11 is what we all need
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Have you ever tried to sleep naked? It is not a big deal, but most people don’t do it because, somehow, they feel uncomfortable. item.title: 18 Pictures of Husbands in the shopping world
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: It’s a woman’s shopping world! If you don’t have a high tolerance to passive aggressive domestic violence, don’t look at these pictures. We’re joking! item.title: 11 Unbelievable design fails that will give you the chills
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Design is also function. Besides looking good to the eye and enchanting our need for beauty, design also has the functionality of embedding all the details into a perfectly-working ensemble that will resist through the years and the ever-changing tastes and trends. Design can also be a futile attempt at embellishing something that can never […]

item.title: 20 most adorable dad-daughter conversations on the planet
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Ok, the word adorable might not apply to all of these, but hey, don’t judge! item.title: Meet the 87-Year-Old Microsoft Paint artist!
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: Remember Microsoft Paint? item.title: What if superheroes got old? Russian artists imagines them as grandparents
item.dc:creator: Ana Maria
item.description: What if superheroes got old? It seems impossible, right? Because superheroes and cartoon characters don’t age. Is it because their superpowers always keep them young or is it just because we like to always remember them at the top of their abilities, fighting crime and villains and always winning? I think it’s a bit of […]

item.description: I think this is the best movie in the Transformers franchise. It’s smooth, but it runs deep into your soul and makes you leave the cinema with a big smile on your face.
